segments.text: Oh , my God . I can't take it any more .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What's wrong , honey ? Take it easy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am tired of doing that boring work . I just repeat doing counting everyday . It's so terrible .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Me too . But I think we can do something else for a change .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You know I work with my professional knowledge not passion . Sometimes I don't know what the meaning of working is ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But you did a good job . You always perform the best in our company .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that's in the past . Maybe I need to go to my psychologist for help .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Perhaps you've just tired and you need a vacation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was full of ambitions before . But now I have no aim for my career .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe we should keep on studying to enrich our knowledge and make our life exciting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds interesting . But I don't know how to do that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A training course ? That must be costly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But it's worth it . Maybe it can get us into a good mood and also helps us learn something to use for the future .
segments.speaker: S2
